goal.ch: This course intends to let the student understand the basic principle of heat transfer. After learning from this course, students are expected to be able to analyze the heat transfer within our daily life (E.g. Air conditioning, electronic cooling)
goal.en: This course intends to let the student understand the basic principle of heat transfer. After learning from this course, students are expected to be able to analyze the heat transfer within our daily life (E.g. Air conditioning, electronic cooling)

outline.ch: This course will introduce the principle of basic heat transfer, including conduction, convection, and radiation. Following by the numerical analysis of steady-state conduction heat transfer. The principle and types of convection heat transfer will be introduced and analyzed next. Also, the application of heat transfer in our daily life will be elaborated.
outline.en: This course will introduce the principle of basic heat transfer, including conduction, convection, and radiation. Following by the numerical analysis of steady-state conduction heat transfer. The principle and types of convection heat transfer will be introduced and analyzed next. Also, the application of heat transfer in our daily life will be elaborated.

textbook.ch: F. P. Incropera, D. P. DeWitt, T. L., Bergman, and A. S. Lavine, Global Edition, 2017, “Principles of Heat and Mass Transfer,”
textbook.en: F. P. Incropera, D. P. DeWitt, T. L., Bergman, and A. S. Lavine, Global Edition, 2017, “Principles of Heat and Mass Transfer,”

gradMethod.ch:
This is a lecture-based class including homework and multiple exams.
Attendance: 10％, Homework: 30％, Midterm: 30％, Final: 30％
gradMethod.en:
This is a lecture-based class including homework and multiple exams.
Attendance: 10％, Homework: 30％, Midterm: 30％, Final: 30％

flexDiscription.ch: 原則16週，17/18週視課堂上課進度
flexDiscription.en: 原則16週，17/18週視課堂上課進度

en.competencies: Design / Development of Solution and Investigation
